ast            : true AND 1

checked expr   : and<Boolean, Boolean>(true, to_boolean<UInt8>(1_u8))
optimized expr : true
output type    : Boolean
output domain  : {TRUE}
output         : true


error: 
  --> SQL:1:1
  |
1 | 'a' and 1
  | ^^^ cannot parse to type `BOOLEAN` while evaluating function `to_boolean('a')` in expr `to_boolean('a')`, during run expr: `(to_boolean('a') AND to_boolean(1))`

  --> SQL:1:9
  |

  |         ^^^ cannot parse to type `BOOLEAN` while evaluating function `to_boolean('a')` in expr `to_boolean('a')`, during run expr: `NOT NOT to_boolean('a')`

checked expr   : xor<Boolean NULL, Boolean NULL>(CAST(NULL AS Boolean NULL), CAST(false AS Boolean NULL))
optimized expr : NULL
output type    : Boolean NULL
output domain  : {NULL}
output         : NULL


ast            : is_true(null)
raw expr       : is_true(NULL)
checked expr   : is_true<Boolean NULL>(CAST(NULL AS Boolean NULL))
optimized expr : false
output type    : Boolean
output domain  : {FALSE}
output         : false


ast            : is_true(false)
raw expr       : is_true(false)
checked expr   : is_true<Boolean>(false)

output type    : Boolean
output domain  : {FALSE}

ast            : is_true(true)
raw expr       : is_true(true)
checked expr   : is_true<Boolean>(true)
optimized expr : true
output type    : Boolean
output domain  : {TRUE}
output         : true


ast            : is_true(col)
raw expr       : is_true(col::Boolean)
checked expr   : is_true<Boolean>(col)
evaluation:

|        | col           | Output        |

| Type   | Boolean       | Boolean       |
| Domain | {FALSE, TRUE} | {FALSE, TRUE} |

| Row 1  | false         | false         |
